creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Today, reference to Controller only shows part of the path, last 2 elements separated by >.

This makes it hard to find the reference when Test plan has many thread groups and elements.

Another improvement could be to add a button to unfold and select the referenced controller.

Created attachment 29592
Screenshot showing the new display
